notes.text: The praefatio establishes Albrisius's relationship with his patron Cicco Simonetta, explicitly comparing him to Maecenas, the famous patron of Augustan poets.
notes.author: Editor

notes.text: The manuscript reading 'Mecoenatem' preserves the medieval spelling. Classical Latin would have 'Maecenatem'.
notes.author: Editor

notes.text: This poem was likely written shortly after Albrisius arrived at the Sforza court in Milan, around 1470.
notes.author: Editor
